mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sub_account(date, proof_id, abstraction, subject_id, debit_money, credit_money) VALUES (#{date}, #{proofId}, #{abstraction}, #{subjectId}, #{debitMoney}, #{creditMoney})
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(credit_money) AS creditMoney, SUM(debit_money) AS debitMoney FROM sub_account WHERE subject_id=#{subjectId} AND date < DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d')
